remarks: Combine cases of ` F ` .  TODO:  Can this be done at once in ~ hdmap14lem3 , in order to get rid of ~ hdmap14lem6 ?  Perhaps modify ~ lspsneu to become ` E! k e. K ` instead of ` E! k e. ( K \ { .0. } ) ` ?  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmap14lem7.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap14lem7.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap14lem7.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem7.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem7.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.

hdmap14lem7.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap14lem7.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.

hdmap14lem7.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
hdmap14lem7 $p |- ( ph -> E! g e. A ( S ` ( F .x. X ) ) = ( g .xb ( S ` X ) ) ) $.
